interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Worker B - Organic Dawn Facial Serum (Morning Serum)
Review Date: 2015/10/08
Store: Worker B
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.5 x 1.4 inches; 4.64 Ounces'}
Review Text: I'm reviewing both the Night and Day Serums as they seem to work best in conjunction ( Obviously). I have been using these (Day and Night Serum) for a short time now. While I haven’t seen a difference in deep wrinkles I have seen a diminished fine lines, puffiness, and dull skin. I received them as a sample in exchange for an honest review. I thought because of this I would see no results, I was pleasantly surprised. It goes on easy/ smooth and has a light pleasant scent. It absorbs fast and doesn't leave a residue.I have been adding them to my daily skincare regimen I will continue to use it and see if it helps with the wrinkles. Lastly, I love natural ingredients!
Review Title: Good stuff!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
HANA Organic Skincare - Organic/Vegan Lavender Grains Facial Cleanser + Exfoliator
HANA Organic Skincare
{'Brand': 'HANA Organic Skincare', 'Item Form': 'Grain', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709431672'}
Very gentle but effective! I love beauty products that are natural and non- irritating (a must for sensitive skin!). This mixes into the paste well and doesn't clump. Also, it rinses well and leaves no residue on the skin. However, my only wish is it came in other scents. While I like lavender, and lavender as an ingredient, its not one of my favorite scents. Overall though this works really well (especially on combination skin).
Very gentle, works good!
Worker B - Organic Dawn Facial Serum (Morning Serum)

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Preference:** The user continues to favor gentle, effective products tailored for sensitive skin, with a growing interest in serums that promote skin health and address specific concerns like fine lines and puffiness.
- **Product Type:** They enjoy a wide range of facial products, including cleansers, exfoliators, and serums, particularly those formulated for easy application and quick absorption without residue.
- **Ingredient Focus:** The user is committed to using organic, vegan ingredients, reflecting a preference for ethical and sustainable beauty solutions, as well as a strong appreciation for the benefits of natural formulations.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** The user enjoys a light, pleasant scent in their products and is open to exploring more fragrance options for variety, indicating a continued interest in sensory experiences within their skincare routine.
- **Skin Type Concern:** Their focus remains on products suitable for acne-prone and combination skin types, emphasizing a holistic approach to balancing skin health while addressing aging concerns such as fine lines and dullness.

Overall, the user is inclined toward holistic beauty that prioritizes skin sensitivity, natural ingredients, and effectiveness, while also appreciating the integration of new products that align with their skincare goals.
